Html: Do you have any release notes for the changes in 2.0.1 ??
Hopefully issue v2 no longer generating both minified and unminified version has been fixed.

Check comment in

http://chirpy.codeplex.com/SourceControl/list/changesets

 

- Fix : bug?: combobox items added repeatedly in Chirpy v2.0

- Update xsd (update enumation MinifyType)

- New config setting Options > Chirpy > Config > checkbox "show detail log"

- "Root element not found" error when creating chirp.config

- Adding support for CSSLint

- Fix for relative paths for files in a config c:\test\content\plugin\..\script.js

- ...
